data.Content: I start my visiting at Singapore Management University under the supervison of Prof. Yong Wang
Our paper Deep Colormap Extraction from Visualizations is accepted to TVCG! The preprint version is available here.
Our paper on online proctoring is officially accepted to CHI2021! The preprint version is available here.
I will present at CIKM2020 in session 'Urban Computing' on Oct. 23rd.
Start my PhD study in HKUST VisLab under the supervision of Prof. Huamin Qu
